H0.text: Short legs would best help a rabbit survive in snow.

H1.text: Dim eyesight is the characteristic that would best help a rabbit survive in snow.

H2.text: Thick, white fur would best help a rabbit survive in snow.

H3.text: Slow movement is the characteristic that would best help a rabbit survive in snow.

A4.text: The Arctic hare has shortened ears and limbs, a small nose, and a thick coat of fur.

A5.text: The white fur of Arctic hares has a high reflectance which may prevent excessive heat gain during the day.
